original_text: Do not deceive each other with lies. Remember that you have taken off your old nature, like an old coat. As a result, you can stop doing all the bad things that you liked to do before.
korean_text: 너희가 서로 거짓말을 하지 말라 옛 사람과 그 행위를 벗어 버리고

sentences.original_text: Do not deceive each other with lies
Remember that you have taken off your old nature
you can stop doing all the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 모든 나쁜 일들을 그치게 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that you liked to do before
